panels.description: Shows if metrics are being received for the selected time range.
panels.title: Metrics

panels.description: Shows the timestamp of the latest metrics received for this integration in the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Latest metrics received

panels.description: Shows the installed version of this integration.
panels.title: Integration version

panels.description: The number of clusters in the datacenter.
panels.title: Clusters

panels.description: The number of ESXi hosts in the datacenter.
panels.title: ESXi hosts

panels.description: The number of resource pools in the datacenter.
panels.title: Resource pools

panels.description: The number of virtual machines in the datacenter.
panels.title: VMs

panels.description: The number of virtual machines currently powered on that belong to a cluster in the datacenter.
panels.title: Clustered VMs on

panels.description: The number of virtual machines currently powered off that belong to a cluster in the datacenter.
panels.title: Clustered VMs off

panels.description: The number of virtual machines currently in a suspended state that belong to a cluster in the datacenter.
panels.title: Clustered VMs suspended

panels.description: The number of virtual machine templates that belong to a cluster in the datacenter.
panels.title: Clustered VM templates

panels.description: The number of ESXi hosts that are currently running (responding and not in maintenance mode) that belong to a cluster within the datacenter.
panels.title: Clustered active ESXi hosts

panels.description: The number of ESXi hosts that are currently not running (not responding or in maintenance mode) that belong to a cluster within the datacenter.
panels.title: Clustered inactive ESXi hosts

panels.description: The clusters with the highest CPU utilization percentage in the datacenter.
panels.title: Top CPU utilization by cluster

panels.description: The clusters with the highest memory utilization percentage in the datacenter.
panels.title: Top memory utilization by cluster

panels.description: Information about the clusters in the vCenter environment.
panels.title: Clusters table

panels.description: The resource pools with the highest CPU usage in the datacenter.
panels.title: Top CPU usage by resource pools

panels.description: The resource pools with the highest memory usage in the datacenter.
panels.title: Top memory usage by resource pools

panels.description: The resource pools with the highest amount of CPU shares allocated in the datacenter.
panels.title: Top CPU shares by resource pools

panels.description: The resource pools with the highest amount of memory shares allocated in the datacenter.
panels.title: Top memory shares by resource pools

panels.description: The ESXi hosts with the highest CPU utilization in the datacenter.
panels.title: Top CPU utilization by ESXi hosts

panels.description: The ESXi hosts with the highest memory utilization in the datacenter.
panels.title: Top memory utilization by ESXi hosts

panels.description: The ESXi hosts with the highest average disk latency in the datacenter.

targets.expr: topk ($top_resource_count, sum by (job, vcenter_datacenter_name, vcenter_cluster_name, vcenter_host_name) (vcenter_host_disk_latency_avg_milliseconds{job=~"$job",vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$vcenter_datacenter_name"}))

panels.title: Top avg disk latency by ESXi hosts

panels.description: The ESXi hosts with the highest percentage of packet errors in the datacenter.

targets.expr: topk ($top_resource_count, sum by (job, vcenter_datacenter_name, vcenter_cluster_name, vcenter_host_name) (vcenter_host_network_packet_error_rate{object="",job=~"$job",vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$vcenter_datacenter_name"}) / clamp_min(sum by (job, vcenter_datacenter_name, vcenter_cluster_name, vcenter_host_name) (vcenter_host_network_packet_rate{object="",job=~"$job",vcenter_datacenter_name=~"$vcenter_datacenter_name"}), 1))

panels.title: Top packet errors by ESXi hosts

panels.description: Information about the datastores in the vCenter environment.
panels.title: Datastores table

list.description: This variable allows for modification of top resource value.
list.label: Top resource count
list.name: top_resource_count
